title: My dad
creator_credit: Fan Chen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: In China where they lived in rather poor conditions, Fan Chen’s father worked hard to support his family and provide a better life for them, eventually making the move to Australia in 2006. This story is a ‘thank you’ from his admiring son.
creator_credit_for_label: Fan Chen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
